meanings.definition: The action of restructuring files on a computer's hard drive to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent1: Defragmentation can help your computer run faster by organizing files better.
meanings.sent2: I performed a defragmentation on my computer to make it work more efficiently.
meanings.sent3: After the defragmentation, my computer seemed to breathe a sigh of relief.
meanings.sent4: The defragmentation was like putting together a jigsaw puzzle of data pieces.
meanings.sent5: The defragmentation process made the computer's hard drive feel brand new.

meanings.definition: The process of organizing fragmented data into a contiguous sequence.
meanings.sent1: Defragmentation is essential for keeping your files in order and easy to access.
meanings.sent2: My computer automatically runs defragmentation to keep everything organized.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the defragmentation was like tidying up a messy room of data.
meanings.sent4: The defragmentation process is like assembling a scattered puzzle into a complete picture.
meanings.sent5: The defragmentation of the data made everything flow smoothly on my computer.
